citations.narrative:
- In the juvenile birds area a cage of birds was located underneath an empty cage that had an excessive accumulation of
debris, feathers, cobwebs and other waste. The birds underneath the dirty cage were at risk of contamination from falling
debris. Primary enclosures must ensure that all birds have the option to remain dry and clean. Facility must ensure that
birds are protected from contamination or debris from the surrounding environment.
Corrected at the time of inspection
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
n

narrative:
3.153(a)(1)(v) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
- In the juvenile birds area a cage of birds was located underneath an empty cage that had an excessive accumulation of 
debris, feathers, cobwebs and other waste. The birds underneath the dirty cage were at risk of contamination from falling 
debris. Primary enclosures must ensure that all birds have the option to remain dry and clean. Facility must ensure that 
birds are protected from contamination or debris from the surrounding environment. 
Corrected at the time of inspection 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
